metadata.title: CVE-2024-50129 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: pse-pd: Fix out of bound for loopAdjust the loop limit to prevent out-of-bounds access when iterating overPI structures. The loop should not reach the index pcdev->nr_lines sincewe allocate exactly pcdev->nr_lines number of PI structures. This fixensures proper bounds are maintained during iterations.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-18.18').
